scripts.build:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && gulp build && gulp sitemap && npm run -s test
scripts.build:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging && gulp build && npm run -s test
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && gulp build && npm run -s test
scripts.test: npm run -s lint:js && npm run -s lint:html

help.description: Generates List of NPM Scripts you can run

preversion.description: This should not be used manually, as it is part of a release process.

postversion.description: This should not be used manually, as it is part of a release process.

start.description: Starts Local Server and Opens Browser to http://localhost:8081 for Development

build:production.description: Compiles Website for Production to ./dist on Local Server

build:staging.description: Compiles Website for Staging to ./dist on Local Server

test.description: Executes both npm run lint:js && npm run lint:html

lint:js.description: Verifies all JS Code used in ./src is free from errors

lint:html.description: Verifies all HTML Code used in ./src is free from errors

cdn.description: Uploads Static Assets to CDN ( this is automated remotely and not needed to run locally )
